headline: Reasons to Add American Water Works to Your Portfolio Right Now
summary: AWK makes a strong case for investment, given its solid earnings growth prospects, expanding customer base and long-term investments.

headline: Pennsylvania American Water and the American Water Charitable Foundation Provide Over $2.1 Million in Statewide Support to Communities in 2024
summary: MECHANICSBURG, Pa., April 16, 2025--Pennsylvania American Water announced its charitable giving for 2024. Last year, the company provided more than $1.4 million through grants, general charitable contributions and programming support to 325 organizations across Pennsylvania. When combined with the $669,000 provided by the American Water Charitable Foundation, the total amount of support increases to more than $2.1 million.
